author: Special Correspondent
text:
The Senior Divisional Commercial Manager of Tiruchi Railway Division has opened Twitter handle under the name “Sr DCM/TPJ” and opened a helpline number 0431-2418992 to interact and ascertain suggestions and grievances from the travellers.

A release said travelling public and customers under Tiruchi Railway Division’s jurisdiction could avail the facility to air their grievances and put forth suggestions.
title: Helpline, Twitter handle to receive rail travellers’ suggestions
